name: Broccoli Quest
summary: BROCCOLI QUEST was made as an exercise in one afternoon using Mosi, a simple HTML engine created by itch user Zenzoa. In Broccoli Quest you play as a strange long-nosed man who's run out of broccoli. Features include: Giving sunglasses to a Goblin, soothing a foul-mouthed pirate, fumbling for broccoli in the dark.
